properties.displayName: File Download And Execution Via IEExec.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "http://" or ProcessCommandLine contains "https://") and (FolderPath endswith "\\IEExec.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "IEExec.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of the IEExec utility to download and execute files
